scripts.build-server: cd server && yarn build && yarn copy-types-for-client && cd ../
scripts.install-client: cd client && yarn && cd ../ && yarn copy-types-from-server
scripts.start-dev: NODE_ENV=development concurrently "cd client && yarn watch-css" "cd client && yarn start" "cd server && yarn build && yarn start-dev"
scripts.start-server-prod: cd server && yarn build && yarn start-prod
scripts.now-build: yarn && yarn install-deps && yarn build-client && yarn build-server
